text: Flux was a software program that could create and display 3D images. Flux existed as a plug-in for web browsers like Internet Explorer and as an installable computer program. == Weblinks == * Flux - Official site* * Flux - History * Flux - Alternatives * NEW! Flux Studio 2.0 - Availability * MediaMachines Open Sources FluxPlayer for X3D - Importance Category:Graphics software Category:Web software
title: Flux (software)
